data.text: But, seriously, when I was -- I had this health scare.

data.text: They took a look and they did one of these body scans,

data.text: this work ethic and he was talking about

translation.text: mỗi phút trong ngày. "

data.text: how he went to the Betty Ford clinic.

data.text: So, when you called me about it, I was really empathic

translation.text: Vì vậy, khi bạn gọi cho tôi về nó, tôi thực sự đồng cảm

data.text: because I've been there and I know what it's like.

data.text: And I said to you, "It will blow over."

translation.text: Và tôi nói với bạn, "Nó sẽ nổ tung."

data.text: And I believe it did,

translation.text: Và tôi tin rằng nó đã làm,

title: Howard Stern's Cancer Scare Inspired Him to Write Howard Stern Comes Again (Extended Interview)
